question: What does Senso.ai do?
response:
Here’s what Senso.ai does:

・ Senso.ai is an AI-powered knowledge management **platform**, primarily serving financial institutions such as **credit unions**, banks, and lenders. It converts unstructured content—like policies, procedures, call transcripts, emails, chat logs, and other documents—into structured, trustworthy answers that can be easily accessed and used by both AI tools and human teams ([senso.ai](https://www.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [aitoolsmarketer.com](https://aitoolsmarketer.com/ai-tool/senso/?utm_source=openai), [theindex.work](https://theindex.work/companies/senso?utm_source=openai)).

・ Its solution aims to **improve operational efficiency, enhance customer support, and deliver consistent, accurate responses**. Organizations use Senso.ai to fill knowledge gaps, streamline internal workflows, accelerate document retrieval, and reduce response times. For example, some users have seen document retrieval times improved by up to **12×**, and support wait times reduced from 15 minutes to 3 minutes, with answer quality improving by over **68%** ([senso.ai](https://senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [aitoolsmarketer.com](https://aitoolsmarketer.com/ai-tool/senso/?utm_source=openai)).

・ Two of Senso.ai’s core AI agents are **Agent Echo** and **Agent Fetch**:
   • **Agent Echo** extracts insights from conversations—such as call transcripts or chat messages—to inform content improvements and keep knowledge up-to-date.
   • **Agent Fetch** ingests and enhances internal documents (manuals, guides, policies) into high-quality, AI-ready responses ([senso.ai](https://senso.ai/?utm_source=openai)).

These agents work together in a feedback loop to continuously refine the platform’s knowledge base, delivering smarter insights, consistent communication, faster responses, and better answers across channels ([senso.ai](https://senso.ai/?utm_source=openai), [aitoolsmarketer.com](https://aitoolsmarketer.com/ai-tool/senso/?utm_source=openai)).

・ Senso.ai also offers analytics to help brands monitor how they’re represented across AI-powered platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity—aiming to ensure their content remains visible, accurate, and aligned with their brand’s “ground truth” messaging ([senso.ai](https://www.senso.ai/?utm_source=openai)).

・ Originally, Senso.ai began by serving credit unions, offering an AI-powered knowledge base tailored to their operational needs, reducing contact times by over **10×** and helping with FAQs and behavioral insights from member interactions ([ycombinator.com](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/senso?utm_source=openai)).

・ The company is based in **Toronto**, Canada, and operates on a **cloud-based, subscription SaaS model**, allowing financial institutions to gain real-time, automated insights that continually improve over time ([app.dealroom.co](https://app.dealroom.co/companies/senso_ai?utm_source=openai), [highperformr.ai](https://www.highperformr.ai/company/senso.ai?utm_source=openai)).

In summary, **Senso.ai transforms fragmented, unstructured organizational knowledge into a centralized, intelligent, and AI-ready knowledge base**, enhancing both human and AI-driven support experiences in the financial services industry—especially for credit unions—by enabling faster, more accurate, and brand-consistent responses across all customer touchpoints.

If you'd like a deeper breakdown of its pricing, competitors, or how it's implemented in specific organizations, feel free to ask!
